Question: Provizio CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Provizio

VizioPrime 6K

 - Software defined digital Imaging Radar
 - Perception solution aimed at eliminating road fatalities
 - Promotes safe, equitable mobility
 - 5D Perception system to be widely available by 2025
 - Presented at CES 2024
Summary_cn:
Provizio

VizioPrime 6K

- 软件定义数字成像雷达
- 旨在消除道路事故的感知解决方案
- 促进安全、公平的出行方式
- 5D感知系统将在2025年广泛应用
- 在2024年的CES展会上展示
